Class MaxEntModelW

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.MaxEntModelW
public class MaxEntModelW extends Object
MaxEnt model of profiles of S/U composition and transition probabilities along BKHS chains when BKHS is represented with a mixture of chain lengths

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MaxEntModelW(String outF, int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu, String inDir)
    MaxEnt model of profiles of S/U composition and transition probabilities along BKHS chains when BKHS is represented with a mixture of chain lengths; saves MaxEnt individual species abundances (*.pind.res file)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    glAndRholAndProfExamples(String inDir, String outDir)
    saves distributions of chain lengths, composition as a function of chain length and profiles (composition and transition probabilities)
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Main entry point
    static void
    makeProf(String inDir, String pref)
    reads a file containing MaxEnt abundances of individual species (pref.pind.res) and save files containing: NRE and RE profiles of disaccharide composition (pref.prof.res) disaccharide composition as a function of chain length (pref.rhol.res) profile of transition probabilities when aligning by NRE (pref.ptnre.res) profile of transition probabilities when aligning by RE (pref.ptre.res)
    static void
    makeSig15(String inDir, String outDir)
    makes and saves individual species abundances for sigma = 1.5
    static void
    makeSig35(String inDir, String outDir)
    makes and saves individual species abundances for sigma = 3.5

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MaxEntModelW

      public MaxEntModelW(String outF, int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu, String inDir)
      MaxEnt model of profiles of S/U composition and transition probabilities along BKHS chains when BKHS is represented with a mixture of chain lengths; saves MaxEnt individual species abundances (*.pind.res file)
      Parameters:
      outF - prefix for output files
      lmin - smallest chain length
      lmax - largest chain length
      sigma - spread of chain lengths
      mu - average chain length
      inDir - input directory

  • Method Details

    • makeProf

      public static void makeProf(String inDir, String pref)
      reads a file containing MaxEnt abundances of individual species (pref.pind.res) and save files containing: NRE and RE profiles of disaccharide composition (pref.prof.res) disaccharide composition as a function of chain length (pref.rhol.res) profile of transition probabilities when aligning by NRE (pref.ptnre.res) profile of transition probabilities when aligning by RE (pref.ptre.res)
      Parameters:
      inDir - input directory (ends with "/")
      pref - prefix for output files

    • makeSig35

      public static void makeSig35(String inDir, String outDir)
      makes and saves individual species abundances for sigma = 3.5
      Parameters:
      inDir - input directory (ends with "/")
      outDir - output directory (ends with "/")

    • makeSig15

      public static void makeSig15(String inDir, String outDir)
      makes and saves individual species abundances for sigma = 1.5
      Parameters:
      inDir - input directory (ends with "/")
      outDir - output directory (ends with "/")

    • glAndRholAndProfExamples

      public static void glAndRholAndProfExamples(String inDir, String outDir)
      saves distributions of chain lengths, composition as a function of chain length and profiles (composition and transition probabilities)
      Parameters:
      inDir - input directory (ends with "/")
      outDir - output directory (ends with "/")
